price: 21 inertes et sans vie, n’ayant aucune idée du Jour où ils seront ressuscités.
arabic: أَمۡوَٰتٌ غَيۡرُ أَحۡيَآءٖۖ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: amwātun ghayru aḥyāin wamā yashʿurūna ayyāna yub'ʿathūna
